hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="HJ-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start rsyslog2-jessie-small-metacloud /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ################ /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog-client.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-client_netstat.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpjdwpd/tests/hpjwdpd.sh'
